settings.title: Settings
settings.tech_support_description: If you need technical support or have any questions, providing this information about the device you are using will help us assist you more efficiently.
settings.settings_lang_directions: Please open your device Settings and navigate to Display > Font size.
settings.dev_menu_instructions: Hold menu tab for 2 seconds to open Developer menu
settings.delete_user_modal: Are you sure you want delete your profile?
settings.delete_user_message: Deleting your account will permanently remove your personal details and disconnect all friend links. Incidents you reported will remain anonymously for evidential purposes.

general.title: Title
general.error_data: Error fetching data! Please check your WIFI connection.
general.db_connection_error: Unable to connect to the database. Please try again.
general.enter_pin: Enter PIN to access dev menu
general.permission_required_text: Noa app needs access to your location for maps to work properly. Please enable location permissions, after that you will be redirected to app location settings where you can select 'Allow all the time'.
general.check_wifi: Something went wrong. Please check your WIFI connection.
general.permission_blocked_text: This app needs access to your location to display interactive map. Please enable location services in your settings.
general.permission_modal_title: Who can find me on this event?
general.welcome_desc: Welcome to the NOA Beach Club app! Enjoy exploring all our features designed to enhance your clubing experience.
general.welcome_desc_no_user: Welcome to the Noa app. Please login or create a profile to experience the app fully.
general.thank_you_desc_form: Your form has been successfully submitted.

terms.accept: I have read and i Agree and accept this

onboardScreen.page_one_subtitle: Contribute to sustainability with easy, effective recycling.
onboardScreen.page_two_subtitle: Find the nearest recycling drop-off points with real-time updates.
onboardScreen.page_three_subtitle: Instantly identify your waste and get proper disposal instructions with AI.

friends.no_friends_text: Currently there is no friends on list. Try to add some friends.
friends.no_friends_login_text: Currently there is no friends on list. To show your friends please try to login.
friends.friend_request_accepted_message: To add this person to your friends list, please send them a friend request as well.
friends.friend_request_declined_message: You can still send a friend request if you like. They will need to wait 1 day before sending you another request.
friends.no_user_found: No user found with the provided information. Please check and try again.
friends.request_sent: Your friend request has been sent successfully!
friends.no_phone: This user does not have phone number saved
friends.no_friend_location: It is currently not possible to retrieve a friend's location

notifications.subtitle: New notifications
notifications.no_notifications_text: Currently there is no messages. Here you will see notifications from us about your reported incident.

form.name: Name
form.title: Title
form.want_contact: Do you want to be contacted?
form.photo_permission_message: This app needs access to the photo library to select images
form.permission_blocked_message: This app requires access to your photo library to select images. Please enable this permission in your settings.
form.camera_permission_message: This app needs access to the camera to take pictures
form.contacts_permission_message: This app needs access to the contacts to add friend from your contacts
form.share_location: Do you want to share your location?
form.max_images_alert: You can only upload up to 4 images!
form.validation_errors: Check the form for mandatory fields and try again.
form.password_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
form.general_error: An error occurred. Please try again later.
form.captcha_description: Recaptcha verification failed. Please try again.

login.opt_description: We have sent you a verification code to your email!
login.otp_invalid_code: Invalid verification code. Please enter a valid 6-digit code.
login.otp_verified_success: Verification verified successfully! You can now login.
login.otp_verified_success_alt: Verification verified successfully! You can now reset your password.
login.otp_verification_failed: Failed to verify verification. Please try again.
login.otp_unexpected_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
login.success_message_register: Success! Please check your email to verify your account!
login.password_request_success: Success! Please check your email to reset your password!
login.password_request_failed: Failed to request new password! Try again later.
login.password_reset_success: Success! You can now login with your new password!
login.password_reset_failed: Failed to reset password! Try again later.
